info.title: Länderspiel (nicht Fussball)
info.description:
This API provides a trivia game that tests the players knowledge about countries.
Each round of the game consists of different kind of questions. 
The player answers the questions and earns points based on conditions, such as the amount of attempts that were needed. 
The API keeps track of the players score.

get.summary: Get list of played games by user (a.k.a game history).
get.description: Returns a paginated list of all the games a user has played, ordered by the most recent first. This endpoint will only return data if the user's profile is not set to private.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page.

delete.summary: Delete all played games by user.
delete.description: Deletes ALL the games a user has played (clears game history). Only the owner of the history can perform this operation. The overall score is reset to 0 and monthly rankings are also deleted.

200.description: Successful deletion - deletedNum is the total number of deleted played Games.
